channel.title: A different kind of request
channel.description:
Well... here's the thing. I'm great at making websites. I suck at photoshop and i suck even more at imagining things.
[size=20pt]T[/size]his is generally what i need... My mind has been set for a while to make a web development forum (smf). But of course it would need its own design. What you would have to do is make a light-colored forum theme that is stunning. I'm sure we could work out some kind of reward, although it cannot be money or anything like that.
If you are interested in helping, my msn is [font=arial]Mike.Wayne.Vartan@gmail.com[/font]

item.title: A different kind of request
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
